document_data.name: South Tesh Gate
document_data.mainbody: The '''South Tesh Gate''' was the northeastern entry point into the city of [[Zhentil Keep]]'s [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The South Tesh Gate sat on the southern side of the [[Tesh Bridge]] that spanned the [[River Tesh]] where it met the [[Moonsea (lake)|Moonsea]].
document_data.Defenses: The gate was flanked by a pair of guard towers. Furthermore, a [[Zhentilar]] guardpost was located just inside the gate in the Foreign Quarter.
document_data.Activities: The South Tesh Gate provided access to both the Foreign Quarter via the Tesh Bridge from the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]] and [[Zhentil Keep/Harbor District|Harbor District]] in southeastern Zhentil Keep.
